news.title: GoPro, Krispy Kreme join the meme party as Wall Street speculation ramps up
news.summary: Reddit-obsessed retail traders targeted wearable camera firm GoPro and donut maker Krispy Kreme on Wednesday. Reddit-obsessive retail traders target wearable camera company GoPro.

news.title: Goldman Sachs and BNY join forces to transform $7.1 trillion money market industry with digital tokens
news.summary: BNY will be able to invest in money market funds whose ownership will be recorded on Goldman's blockchain platform. Clients of BNY will have the option to buy and sell shares in the funds.

news.title: Uber will let women drivers and riders request to avoid being paired with men starting next month
news.summary: Uber will pilot the women preference program in Los Angeles, San Francisco and Detroit starting next month. Uber will Pilot the Women Preference Program in L.A., San Francisco, Detroit and Detroit.

news.title: McDonald's revamped Snack Wraps are winning over customers
news.summary: McDonald's snack wraps are driving traffic and sales growth for the burger chain. Early data shows that McDonald's snackwraps are driving sales growth.

news.title: CrowdStrike-backed compliance startup Vanta valued at $4 billion in new funding round
news.summary: Vanta's latest funding round lifts the company valuation to roughly $4 billion. Vanta was valued at $2.45 billion last year.

news.title: ‘If I was writing the checks at Coke, I wouldn’t write the check for this,’ one expert says about cane-sugar Coke
news.summary: Coca-Cola's new offering will soon vie against the classic version made with high fructose corn syrup. The new Coca-Cola will be available in the U.S. and Canada.

news.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
news.summary: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA,” she says.

news.title: Asian investors face $46 trillion portfolio dilemma with their U.S. holdings
news.summary: Asian investors need to figure out where to put their trillions, and don't want to over invest in the U.S., says Morgan Stanley.

news.title: The S&P 500 just did something it’s only done four times in 50 years. Here’s what happened next.
news.summary: Ryan Detrick, chief market strategist at the Carson Group, uncovered an eye-popping stat about the current state of play. Detrick: The U.S. stock market is on the verge of a bear market.

news.title: Brazil’s trade-dependent stock market could soar if Trump’s tariffs are found to be illegal
news.summary: Brazil’s onerous taxes and political turmoil make investors wary. But an international court ruling could change their minds. Brazil is home to one of the largest economies in the world.
